nodes.text: The Coronet Highway Patrol was an Imperial Military law enforcement agency in Coronet City on the planet Corellia. It consisted of Imperial patrol troopers that utilized C-PH patrol speeder bikes. In 13 BBY, a patrol trooper of the Coronet Highway Patrol was involved in a police chase with Han as he and Qi'ra escaped from the White Worms and later crashed.
The Coronet Highway Patrol was named and based on the 1977-1983 TV series CHiPs, which featured members of the real-life California Highway Patrol.
